header.title: Become visible as an agent

form.title: Profile details

form.headingExperienceHint: The more complete your profile, the easier clients can assess if you are a good fit.
form.regionsHint: In which federal states are you active? Select all that apply.
form.languagesHint: Select all languages in which you can advise clients.
form.specialtiesHint: What are your typical focus areas? (e.g. sales, rentals, new build, investment)

success.title: Application submitted successfully
success.text: Thank you! Your profile will now be reviewed by our team. You will receive an email as soon as your account has been approved.
